name: ThoughtOfTheDay
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: thought of the day
des: This contains plenty of motivational thought which will keep you motivated and fills your day with full of positivity and motivation. You only need to say "Alexa, Thought Of the Day." and let Alexa to Motivate you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
